bug.author: javadba
bug.summary: Changed port in config.json but app still launches on port 8200
bug.description: Here is my updated config.json: { "title": "Label Studio", "port":12345, "debug": false, "label_config": "config.xml", "input_path": "tasks.json", "output_dir": "completions", "instruction": "Type some hypertext for label experts!", "allow_delete_completions": true, "templates_dir": "examples", "editor": { "debug": false }, "sampling": "uniform" } But the app launched on 8200 anyways. Ideas?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/javadba>@javadba</denchmark-link> use cmd argument for that, don't modify config.json
